body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel!
___

**Version Number:**  9.2.59-3
**Reproducible in staging?:** Y
**Reproducible in production?:** Unable to validate in Prod
**If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/72923
**Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** applausetester+ag131125@applause.expensifail.com
**Issue reported by:** Applause - Internal Team


## Action Performed:
Precondition: Use an Expensifail account with no bank account previously set
1. Launch the Expensify app
2. Create a workspace
3. Change the currency to USD if needed
4. Enable Expensify Card
5. Go to the Expensify Card tab > Issue new card
6. Tap on Log into your bank
7. Go through the Plaid flow until you reach the "What's your legal name? screen
8. Enter the following data:
First name: Alberta
Last name: Charleson
9. Tap on Next
10. Tap several times on the back arrow at the top left until you reach the "Add bank account" screen
11. Tap on Continue setup > Confirm

## Expected Result:
The "What's your date of birth?" is displayed

## Actual Result:
The "Manually add your bank account" setup screen is displayed

## Workaround:
Unknown

## Platforms:

title: [$250] Expose some basic data in the JS console when not running in production

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
# Problem When trying to debug issues, reporting the IDs of the relevant objects (policy, report, transaction, etc) is key, so we can inspect the DB, gather logs, etc That data is not currently easily accessible, so it's hard for internal employees as well as contributors to report issues with all the necessary data so that we can investigate them. # Solution When NOT in production (see `isProductionLib` and a similar use case [here](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/9970ee0d37b149233a8c53c6d8ab031a282d672e/src/setup/addUtilsToWindow.ts#L15)), we want to expose to the JS console certain variables: - When in the workspace editor: the `policy` object in the variable `policy` - When in a report: the `report` object in the variable `report`, the `policy` it belongs to in the `policy` variable - When in a one expense report or in the transaction view: the `transaction` object in the variable `transaction`, the `receipt` object in the `receipt` variable (only if transaction has a receipt), the `report` object in the `report` variable and the policy it belongs to in the `policy` variable
Upwork Automation - Do Not Edit

  • Upwork Job ID: 1990458971781193172
  • Last Price Increase: 2025-11-17
Issue OwnerCurrent Issue Owner: @eh2077

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** V9.2.59-1 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/test-runs/TR-1995/folder/13176707/46331221/1016710652 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** Slottwo1 l@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Redminote 10s android 13 **App Component:** User Settings ## Action Performed: 1. Launch app 2. Create a workspace 3. Enable rules 4. Tap Rules - Enable Prevent self approval 5. Tap workflow - Disable all features 6. Tap Rules - Note Prevent self approval is locked and disabled 7. Open workspace chat 8. Create an expense 9. Open the expense 10. Note the header message ## Expected Result: Prevent self approval is locked so expense header must not display oops! Looks like submitting yourself. ## Actual Result: Prevent self approval is locked but expense header displays oops! Looks like submitting yourself. Note : After disabling the workflow, it doesn’t turn off Prevent Self Approval in OD. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e83eccee-9f4c-48b3-b6bd-34f1edbc4d1f [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

Steps: 1. Go to https://staging.new.expensify.com/home and log in 2. Open Reports - Expenses 3. In the search field, type category:uncategorized 4. Select "category:uncategorized" from the suggestions and press Enter ## Expected Result: The filter chip for "uncategorized" should be highlighted in the search field whenever the search is applied. Behavior should be consistent with other categories. ## Actual Result: Expenses with missing categories are correctly shown in the search results. body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** V9.2.59-2 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/test-runs/TR-1995/folder/13176670/41237102/1016710066 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** Slottwo1 l@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Redminote 10s android 13 **App Component:** Workspace Settings ## Action Performed: 1. Launch app 2. Go to workspace settings 3. Enable invoice feature 4. Disable all workflow features 5. Send an invoice 6. Long press invoice created 7. Note Delete option is not shown 8. Open the invoice - More - Delete 9. Note deleting invoice shows unexpected error ## Expected Result: When workflows are disabled, deleting invoice must not show unexpected error. Delete option must be shown on long pressing invoice in preview in context menu. ## Actual Result: When workflows are disabled, deleting invoice shows unexpected error. Delete option is not shown on long pressing invoice in preview in context menu. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f35dbdf0-712d-43ad-b6af-264d17af9518 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

Tap create expense 8. Open the expense 9. Tap amount 10. Note expense created is not negative ## Expected Result: In step 6, flip option must not be shown in confirmation page in amount section. ## Actual Result: In step 6, flip option is shown in confirmation page in amount section. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/cd3b2139-4bba-474f-98e0-ab5d8aa6b416 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
